title: Design Matters From the Archive: Bob Gill
description: Debbie talks to legendary designer Bob Gill about coming up in the profession in the 1950s, about working with the Beatles, and the problem with many designers today.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to legendary designer Bob Gill about coming up in the profession in the 1950s, about working with the Beatles, and the problem with many designers today.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
